translations: v.嘲笑（sneer 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: One saw, even before the 100th anniversary of the death of Queen Victoria this year, that there were signs these sneering attitudes were beginning to change.
sentences.translation: 即使是今年维多利亚女王逝世一百周年纪念日到来之前，人们已看到这种嘲笑的态度正在开始转变。

sentences.sentence: Running out very far I could still hear them sneering.
sentences.translation: 我跑出很远，还能听到他们的嘲笑声。

sentences.sentence: Running out very far, I could still hear them sneering .
sentences.translation: 我跑出很远，还能听到他们的嘲笑声。
